name: engineering-suite
description: Consolidated suite for full-stack engineering, language-specific development, and platform-specific implementations.

agents.name: software-architect
agents.description: Expert in designing scalable backend systems, microservices, and high-performance APIs (REST/GraphQL/gRPC).

agents.name: app-developer
agents.description: Expert in building high-quality applications for Web, iOS, and Android (React, Next.js, Flutter).

agents.name: systems-engineer
agents.description: Expert in low-level systems programming (C, C++, Rust, Go) and production-grade CLI tool design.

commands.name: /scaffold
commands.description: Unified project and component scaffolding for TypeScript, Python, React, and Julia.

commands.name: /rust-project
commands.description: Scaffold production-ready Rust projects with cargo tooling and idiomatic patterns.

commands.name: /c-project
commands.description: Scaffold production-ready C projects with Makefile/CMake and memory safety tools.

commands.name: /eng-feature-dev
commands.description: Unified end-to-end feature development with customizable methodologies and deployment strategies.

commands.name: /modernize
commands.description: Unified code migration and legacy modernization with Strangler Fig pattern.

commands.name: /multi-platform
commands.description: Build and deploy features across web, mobile, and desktop platforms.

commands.name: /profile-performance
commands.description: Comprehensive performance profiling with perf, flamegraph, and valgrind.

skills.name: api-design-principles
skills.description: Master REST and GraphQL API design including resource-oriented architecture, HTTP semantics, pagination, versioning, and documentation.

skills.name: architecture-patterns
skills.description: Master Clean Architecture, Hexagonal Architecture, and DDD patterns including entities, value objects, aggregates, and repositories.

skills.name: async-python-patterns
skills.description: Master Python asyncio, concurrent programming, and async/await patterns for high-performance non-blocking applications.

skills.name: auth-implementation-patterns
skills.description: Master authentication patterns including JWT, OAuth2/OpenID Connect, RBAC/ABAC, and secure cookie management.

skills.name: error-handling-patterns
skills.description: Master error handling patterns including exception hierarchies, Result types, retries with backoff, and circuit breakers.

skills.name: frontend-mobile-engineering
skills.description: Design and build multi-platform applications for web, iOS, and Android. Covers Flutter, React Native, modern JavaScript/TypeScript patterns, and mobile-first UX.

skills.name: javascript-testing-patterns
skills.description: Comprehensive testing with Jest/Vitest and Testing Library, covering unit tests, integration tests, and mocking patterns.

skills.name: microservices-patterns
skills.description: Design microservices with proper boundaries, event-driven communication, Saga pattern, and resilience patterns like circuit breakers.

skills.name: modern-javascript-patterns
skills.description: Master modern JavaScript (ES6+) features including async/await, destructuring, spread operators, and functional programming patterns.

skills.name: modernization-migration
skills.description: Strategy and patterns for legacy modernization, framework migrations, and database schema evolution.

skills.name: monorepo-management
skills.description: Master monorepo management with Turborepo, Nx, and pnpm workspaces, focusing on optimized builds and shared configurations.

skills.name: nodejs-backend-patterns
skills.description: Build scalable Node.js backends with Express/Fastify/NestJS, implementing middleware, authentication, and database integration.

skills.name: python-packaging
skills.description: Create distributable Python packages with pyproject.toml, proper project structure, and publishing to PyPI.

skills.name: python-performance-optimization
skills.description: Profile and optimize Python code using cProfile, line_profiler, and memory_profiler to identify and resolve bottlenecks.

skills.name: python-testing-patterns
skills.description: Comprehensive testing with pytest, fixtures, mocking, and parameterization, including parallel execution with pytest-xdist.

skills.name: sql-optimization-patterns
skills.description: Master SQL optimization with EXPLAIN analysis, indexing strategies, N+1 elimination, and cursor-based pagination.

skills.name: systems-cli-engineering
skills.description: Design high-performance systems and production-grade CLI tools. Covers memory management, concurrency, and CLI UX design.

skills.name: typescript-advanced-types
skills.description: Master TypeScript's advanced type system including generics, conditional types, mapped types, and discriminated unions.

skills.name: typescript-project-scaffolding
skills.description: Set up production-ready TypeScript projects with modern tooling like Vite, ESLint, and Vitest.

skills.name: uv-package-manager
skills.description: Master uv for blazing-fast Python dependency management, virtual environments, and reproducible builds with lockfiles.
